import React from 'react' import useInput from 'client/components/useInput' import useLogin from 'client/components/useLogin' import styles from './Login.module.css' import Link from 'next/link' function index() { const [email, bindEmail, resetEmail] = useInput('') const [pass, bindPass, resetPass] = useInput('') const [isLogin, userLogin, userLogout] = useLogin() const submitHandler = e => { if (email==='aaa@hotmail.com' && pass==='test'){ userLogin(email) e.preventDefault() alert('Success!') resetEmail() resetPass() } else{ e.preventDefault() alert('Try again!') } } return (
Home

{isLogin ? email : null}

{console.log(`login status is ${isLogin}`)}
) } export default index
